title: Video Slave 3.1.1325 – Timecode synchronized video player
content: Use Video Slave 3 to play movie clips in sync with Pro Tools, Cubase, Nuendo, Logic Pro X, Studio One and many other popular DAWs. Video Slave 3 uses MIDI Timecode – a protocol supported by most Digital Audio Workstations on the market today – to drive synchronized movie playback as well as MIDI Machine Control for full scrubbing […]
